memberdef.definition: static boost::multi_array< double, static_cast< size_t > NumberOfDimensions ) > tudat::input_output::MultiArrayFileReader< NumberOfDimensions >::readMultiArray
memberdef.name: readMultiArray

briefdescription.para: Function to read only a multi-array from the file.

detaileddescription.para:
Function to read only a multi-array from the file, not saving the values of the independent variables it is defined.
fileName
Name of the coefficient file
Multi-array containing file contents.

memberdef.type: std::pair< boost::multi_array< double, 1 >, std::vector< std::vector< double > > >
memberdef.definition: static std::pair< boost::multi_array< double, 1 >, std::vector< std::vector< double > > > tudat::input_output::MultiArrayFileReader< NumberOfDimensions >::readMultiArrayAndIndependentVariables
memberdef.name: readMultiArrayAndIndependentVariables

briefdescription.para: Function to read a multi-array from the file, and the values of the independent variables at which it is defined.

detaileddescription.para:
Function to read a multi-array from the file, and the values of the independent variables at which it is defined
fileName
Name of the coefficient file
Pair: first entry containing multi-array of double coefficients, second containing list of independent variables at which coefficients are defined.

briefdescription.para: Interface class for reading coefficients as a function of N independent variables from a file.

detaileddescription.para: Interface class for reading coefficients as a function of N independent variables from a file. This class is used instead of a single templated free function to allow multi-arrays of different sizes to be created using the same interface. NOTE: The possibility of using a single templated implementation for arbitrary multi-array size should be investigated in the future.
